structure.unit: ARTICLE B. - STREET USE AND CLEANLINESS
Sec. 12-1034. - FILTHY MATTER IN WASTE RECEPTACLES.

law.text: It shall be unlawful to place any ashes or empty the contents of any cuspidor or to place any other filthy or objectionable matter in the sidewalk waste receptacles provided for public use. (Code 1959 , ยง19-9)
